actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the imposition of fees or additional taxes on the sale of petroleum products.

summary.text: Prohibits the imposition of fees or additional taxes on the sale of petroleum products under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act or any other provision of law.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the imposition of fees or additional taxes on the sale of petroleum products.
